key_risks: Financial sustainability due to significant capital expenditures and pre-revenue status
Technological risks associated with unproven satellite technology at scale
Regulatory hurdles in obtaining global approvals for space-based cellular coverage
Intense competition from major players like SpaceX, Amazon, and OneWeb
controversies: Environmental concerns over space debris and light pollution from large satellite constellations
Volatility in stock performance reflecting investor uncertainty
environmental_issues: Space debris and light pollution from large satellite constellations
social_issues: Bridging the digital divide by providing internet access to underserved and remote areas
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance and obtaining necessary approvals for satellite deployment
